Shares of Nike Inc. NKE, -2.91% surged 3% afternoon trade Friday, and were the biggest percentage gainers within the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -2.24% as they closed in on a 2 1/2-month high.
The athletic apparel maker said late Thursday that it entered into a strategic partnership with funds affiliated with Apollo Global Management APO, -2.43% to optimize Nike's supply chain.
